definition: a piece of poetry, familiarize through thorough study or experience
details:
noun
- a piece of poetry
= synonyms: rhyme
- a line of metrical text
= synonyms: verse line
- literature in metrical form
= synonyms: poetry, poesy
verb
- familiarize through thorough study or experience
= example: familiarize through thorough study or experience
- compose verses or put into verse
= synonyms: versify, poetize, poetise
